text: ao krom robsakhnhom. chaur puok anak som aphytosa pi mcheasa robsa puok anak promteang sarphap tosakamhosa champoh trong choh . trong nung b pea choh tukaphlieng yeang chraen aoy puok anak haey banthem kamleang leu pheap khlangokla robsa puok anak themtiet . chaur puok anak kom berchenh( pi kar ampeavneav robsakhnhom) daoy tralbtow thveuchea anak br pru td babakamm vinh aoy saoh
